definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

sentences.english: Thirty seconds later someone shot both of them. With incredible accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 30秒後有人像他們開槍，槍法準的出奇。

sentences.english: Booth : He's got no sense of discretion. That kid. Typical squint.
sentences.chinese: 那孩兒點兒正常判斷力沒有，標標準準的眯眼。
